action: Tap 'Email label to close dropdown and focus on form'
observation: I can see the signup form with the language dropdown still expanded. The form shows an email input field that appears to be disabled/greyed out, and below there are terms/conditions links and social login buttons. As an elderly user, I need to close this language dropdown first to access the actual signup form clearly.
reasoning: The language dropdown is still open and blocking proper view of the signup form. I need to close it by tapping away from it or selecting English to proceed with the email registration. The email field appears disabled currently, likely because the language dropdown is interfering.
ux_issues: Language dropdown remains open and may be blocking form interaction
Small text size (12px) in terms and conditions may be hard to read for elderly users

outcome.visual_observation: The dropdown/overlay elements that were visible on the right side of the screen in the BEFORE image have been removed in the AFTER image. The email input field appears to be focused (indicated by the red circular highlight around the email section). The main sign-up form remains intact with all elements properly positioned.
